text: 7.5: Nam 18.21Mbe Rivaiiŋ, mben shɨga ntɨɨri, mben tari, mbe Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgi ki. Mbe Isreriŋ, mben tɨv khaŋ nzuai, mbe mba harigi Isreriŋ, mbe wari wo bigi, mbe nta ndiv phɨkthɨgi phogir mbarav, mbe phok then Rivain nɨɨŋri. Mbe Isreriŋ, mbe Rivain fegi gu ŋgugi ma. Mbe vhɨra, mbe Abrahaman tari ma.
